title: Baby Tyrant - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Absent Parents   Age Progression   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Aristocracy   Beast Companions   Beautiful Female Lead   Bodyguards   Caring Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Child Protagonist   Coming of Age   Court Official   Cruel Characters   Cute Protagonist   Debts   Determined Protagonist   Empires   European Ambience   Familial Love   Family   Famous Parents   Famous Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Guardian Relationship   Handsome Male Lead   Inheritance   Loyal Subordinates   Magic   Maids   Marriage   Master-Servant Relationship   Military   Past Trauma   Politics   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Second Chance   Servants   Siblings   Single Parent   Soldiers   Tragic Past   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong   Wealthy Characters
author: 이횐
description:
‘Less than a month old… I became the great empire’s treasured princess…!’

In all my life, I wanted love. Love from my family, But the family I had, failed me in the end. Abandoned… abused… I don’t want this so-called family. It’s a waste of time.

I came to a new world after a miserable ending…

‘The empire’s treasured princess… that’s me… but why is father, the emperor, so strange?’

“Mabel, I will give you the Ponce Castle.”

“My sweet child, the most fertile land is yours.”

“No, wait, this whole country will be yours for the plucking.”

‘Father, he’s strange… is this what family love is like?’>
